Pre-Game Insights: Bahrain are ranked 86th while Malaysia stand at the 130th position in the latest FIFA rankings
Bahrain have an upper hand coming into this tie, thanks to their better head-to-head record against Malaysia
Others: Both teams come into this AFC Asian Cup tie on the back of defeats. Bahrain were handed a 3-1 defeat by South Korea while Malaysia faced a 4-0 defeat against table toppers Jordan
The 2023 AFC Asian Cup has wrapped up its first matchday and has a lot of exciting fixtures lined up for the second
The match will take place on January 20, 2024, at 20:00 IST
The predicted line-up for Bahrain is (4-1-4-1) and for Malaysia is (3-4-3)
Telecast: Qatar, Bahrain, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Palestine, Syria, Yemen, Oman – BeinSports, Alkass
